segments.text: Well , you know how important a clean house is to your grandma .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I hear about it every time she comes here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She was the head janitor at St . Mary's Hospital for thirty years , after all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think she misses that job and wants to take it out on us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , maybe she's just a neat freak .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think she just likes to make us miserable .
segments.speaker: S2
